name: Slimes ate my city!
description:
A game made for the Mash-Up Game Jam.

You are a Slime, seeking vengeance on humans for keeping you in a laboratory, get them what they deserve using your slime abilities.

Team:

Warodot: Main Developer

Rothbilly: 3D props and UI

Frano: 3D props,  UI Design, Character Design & Sound FX

AlanBrito: Code Master Assistant

Capaths: Music
